description:
Domon is set to face off against Allenby Beardsely, a female Gundam Fighter who defeated Argo in under a minute. He meets her in an arcade and fights her in a fighting simulator, ending in a tie after the machine breaks down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Un Gundam Fighter de charme ! Dangerous Allenby
美少女ファイター! デンジャラス・アレンビー
